name: Programming-Pool.com
overview:
Programming-Pool.com (PPR) is a cutting-edge software development house specializing in web-based applications for various service industries.

Its mission is to use the understanding of technology, business structures and market requirements to create innovative, practical and profitable software applications, as well as to provide a range of supporting services to meet the clients’ specific needs.

Service offerings include bespoke software design solutions, modular ready-to-use software, white-label software development, technology interfacing, strategic planning, concept development and implementation as well as the provision of full back-office services.

Programming-Pool.com works for hospitality service suppliers, governmental agencies, the automotive industry, public sector service providers and market research entities, amongst others.
